thread.title: Extremely Cute (But Small)
thread.title_full: Extremely Cute (But Small) - Review of The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: garnerv
title: Extremely Cute (But Small)
text: The entire hotel is decorated beautifully. The rooms have very modern and had fancy amenities. The bed was extremely comfortable, and everything was clean. I stayed in a room with a king size bed. It was a very small room (no couches or anything) so if you are more than 2 people, you may not be comfortable space wise with the 1 bed option.
